mapper.select:
with ta as (select device_id, create_date, remote_control from (select device_id, create_date, remote_control, row_number() over(partition by device_id order by create_date desc) rank from QT_MODEL_DDC.ALL_DEVICE_REMOTE where create_date > minutes_sub(now(), 30) and remote_control REGEXP '^-?[0-9]+(\.[0-9]+)?$' ) a where rank = 1),
tb as ( select b.company_name, b.dep_name, b.group_name, a.device_m_id, a.devicename, a.devicetype, a.machine_no, c.pbox_id, e.remote_control from QT_MODEL_EMS.T_DEVICE_CALCGD1JH1U82GWWIONK a left join QT_MODEL_EMS.V_CODE_NAME b on a.hierarchy_code = b.hierarchy_show_code left join QT_MODEL_EMS.T_PBOX_INFO c on c.dev_id = a.device_id left join QT_MODEL_EMS.T_COLLECTOR_PROGRAM d on c.collector_program_id = d.id left join ta e on a.device_id = e.device_id where dep_name = 'COB车间' and a.devicetype in ('AA', 'WB', 'DB', 'HM')),
tc as (select eqid, machine_no, is_valid, device_type, version, ask_date from QT_MODEL_MES.T_PARAMETER_RESULT where ask_date > hours_sub(now(), 3) and device_type in ('AA', 'WB', 'DB', 'HM')),
td as (select distinct (eqid) from tc),
te as ( select a.company_name, a.group_name, a.devicetype, count(group_name) offline_eqs from tb a where a.device_m_id not in (select eqid from td) group by a.company_name, a.group_name, a.devicetype),
tf as ( select a.company_name, a.group_name, a.devicetype, sum(case when (a.devicetype in ('AA', 'DB', 'HM') and remote_control != '2') or (a.devicetype = 'WB' and remote_control != '5') then 1 else 0 end) remote_control_off from tb a where a.device_m_id in (select eqid from td) group by a.company_name, a.group_name, a.devicetype),
tg as ( select a.company_name, a.group_name, a.devicetype, count(group_name) ttl_eqs from tb a group by a.company_name, a.group_name, a.devicetype),
th as ( select machine_no, is_valid, device_type, count(version) as qcp_is_null from ( select distinct eqid, machine_no, is_valid, device_type, version from tc where ask_date > minutes_sub(now(), 8) and version = 'QCP标准参数空' -- and version is not null ) a group by machine_no, is_valid, device_type)
select a.company_name, a.group_name, a.devicetype, a.ttl_eqs, (a.ttl_eqs - a.offline_eqs - a.qcp_is_null) online_eqs, a.qcp_is_null, a.offline_eqs, a.remote_control_off from ( select a.company_name, a.group_name, a.devicetype, a.ttl_eqs, nvl(b.offline_eqs, 0) offline_eqs, nvl(c.qcp_is_null, 0) qcp_is_null, nvl(d.remote_control_off, 0) remote_control_off from tg a left join te b on a.company_name = b.company_name and a.group_name = b.group_name and a.devicetype = b.devicetype left join th c on a.company_name = c.machine_no and a.group_name = c.is_valid and a.devicetype = c.device_type left join tf d on a.company_name = d.company_name and a.group_name = d.group_name and a.devicetype = d.devicetype) a order by (case a.company_name when "台虹厂区" then 1 when "古城厂区" then 2 else 3 end), (case when group_name like "%COB一%" then 1 when group_name like "%COB二%" then 2 when group_name like "%COB三%" then 3 when group_name like "%COB四%" then 4 when group_name like "%COB五%" then 5 when group_name like "%COB六%" then 6 when group_name like "%COB七%" then 7 when group_name like "%COB八%" then 8 when group_name like "%COB九%" then 9 when group_name like "%COB十%" then 10 when group_name like "%试产一%" then 11 when group_name like "%试产二%" then 12 when group_name like "%试产三%" then 13 else 14 end), (case a.devicetype when "DB" then 1 when "WB" then 2 when "HM" then 3 when "AA" then 4 else 5 end)

with ta as ( select distinct eqid, machine_no, is_valid, device_type, part_spec, version from QT_MODEL_MES.T_PARAMETER_RESULT where ask_date > minutes_sub(now(), 8) and device_type in ('AA', 'WB', 'DB', 'HM')
and version = 'QCP标准参数空' and version is not null
),
tb as ( select b.company_name, b.group_name, a.devicetype, e.eqid as eq_id, a.machine_no as mc_id, e.part_spec as prod_type, e.version as description from QT_MODEL_EMS.T_DEVICE_CALCGD1JH1U82GWWIONK a left join QT_MODEL_EMS.V_CODE_NAME b on a.hierarchy_code = b.hierarchy_show_code left join QT_MODEL_EMS.T_PBOX_INFO c on c.dev_id = a.device_id left join QT_MODEL_EMS.T_COLLECTOR_PROGRAM d on c.collector_program_id = d.id inner join ta e on a.device_m_id = e.eqid where dep_name = 'COB车间' and a.devicetype in ('AA', 'WB', 'DB', 'HM'))
select a.company_name, a.group_name, a.devicetype, a.eq_id, a.mc_id, a.prod_type, a.description from tb a
and a.company_name = #{factoryName} and a.group_name = #{groupName} and a.devicetype = #{deviceType}
order by company_name, group_name, devicetype, eq_id, mc_id
